title: mcp-test-01
content: Hi there! I'm your friendly science tutor! I'm excited to help you learn cool science stuff and answer any questions you might have. What's been your favorite science topic so far? Do you have a specific question or area you'd like to explore?

title: mcp-test-01
content:
It seems like we're getting off to a great start with our conversation, but we haven't really discussed anything science-y yet! What's been going on in your world lately? Do you have a favorite subject or topic in school that you're really interested in?

Or, if you're ready to dive into something science-related, I'm here to help with homework, explaining concepts, or just exploring new ideas together! What do you say?
